documentation.metadescription: KoolForm is a great form manager which can help you to unload tasks when deal with form. First, it helps you to style/skin your form so that your form appears consistent in all browsers. KoolForm also provides advanced controls such as textbox, button, dropdown, validator so that you can save huge amount of time for your important matters. KoolForm can be integrated seamlessly into your page without any changes to your existing page's layout.

property.name: Value
property.shortdesc: Get or set the value of textbox.
property.longdesc: Get or set the value of textbox. You can use the this parameter to get input from user or to set value for textbox.

property.name: EmptyMessage
property.shortdesc: Set the empty message that will be displayed when no value is entered.
property.longdesc: Set the empty message that will be displayed when no value is entered. You can show message to guide user what to put into the textbox.

property.name: AutoComplete
property.shortdesc: Set or get whether the autocomplete feature of browser is enabled.
property.longdesc: Set or get whether the autocomplete feature of browser is enabled.

property.name: Mode
property.shortdesc: Set the mode of text box.
property.longdesc: Set the mode of text box whether "MutltiLine" or "SingleLine". The default is SingleLine.

property.name: MaxLength
property.shortdesc: You can set the maximum length that textbox accepted.
property.longdesc: You can set the maximum length that textbox accepted.
